name: Ern

attributes.name: Died
values: Sometime before Wyl Lark's return between 5 and 11 ABY

content:
Ern was a human from the planet Polyneus who lived in Ridge. By the time of Wyl Lark's return to Ridge some time after the Battle of Jakku but before 11 ABY, Ern had died.
Ern was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
